data.name: Spider-Slayer
data.description: J. Jonah Jameson leaves his desk behind to operate the Spider-Slayer robot and trades hard-hitting investigative journalism for decimating blows against his more evasive enemies.

starItems.name: Spider-Slayer
starItems.description: J. Jonah Jameson leaves his desk behind to operate the Spider-Slayer robot and trades hard-hitting investigative journalism for decimating blows against his more evasive enemies.

1.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>15%</color> Piercing + Bonus Attack <color=#86e619>2</color> times for <color=#86e619>15%</color> Piercing.

Apply <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> to a non-summoned <color=#fff568>SINISTER SIX</color> ally with the highest Damage, that doesn't have <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color>.

This attack cannot be dodged.
1.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Piercing to primary and secondary attacks

2.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>20%</color> Piercing + Bonus Attack <color=#86e619>2</color> times for <color=#86e619>20%</color> Piercing.

Apply <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> to a non-summoned <color=#fff568>SINISTER SIX</color> ally with the highest Damage, that doesn't have <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color>.

This attack cannot be dodged.
2.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Piercing to primary and secondary attacks

3.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>25%</color> Piercing + Bonus Attack <color=#86e619>2</color> times for <color=#86e619>25%</color> Piercing.

Apply <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> to a non-summoned <color=#fff568>SINISTER SIX</color> ally with the highest Damage, that doesn't have <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color>.

This attack cannot be dodged.
3.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Piercing to primary and secondary attacks

4.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>30%</color> Piercing + Bonus Attack <color=#86e619>2</color> times for <color=#86e619>30%</color> Piercing.

Apply <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> to a non-summoned <color=#fff568>SINISTER SIX</color> ally with the highest Damage, that doesn't have <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color>.

This attack cannot be dodged.
4.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Piercing to primary and secondary attacks

5.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>40%</color> Piercing + Bonus Attack <color=#86e619>2</color> times for <color=#86e619>40%</color> Piercing.

Apply <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> to a non-summoned <color=#fff568>SINISTER SIX</color> ally with the highest Damage, that doesn't have <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color>.

This attack cannot be dodged.
5.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Piercing to primary and secondary attacks

6.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>50%</color> Piercing + Bonus Attack <color=#86e619>2</color> times for <color=#86e619>50%</color> Piercing.

Apply <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> to a non-summoned <color=#fff568>SINISTER SIX</color> ally with the highest Damage, that doesn't have <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color>.

This attack cannot be dodged.
6.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Piercing to primary and secondary attacks

7.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>100%</color> Piercing + Bonus Attack <color=#86e619>2</color> times for <color=#86e619>100%</color> Piercing.

Apply <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> to a non-summoned <color=#fff568>SINISTER SIX</color> ally with the highest Damage, that doesn't have <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color>.

This attack cannot be dodged.

1.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>100%</color> Piercing.
If there are any <color=#fff568>SPIDER-VERSE</color> enemies, attack those enemies for <color=#86e619>150%</color> Piercing instead.

This attack cannot be dodged.

2.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>130%</color> Piercing.
If there are any <color=#fff568>SPIDER-VERSE</color> enemies, attack those enemies for <color=#86e619>180%</color> Piercing instead.

This attack cannot be dodged.

3.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>160%</color> Piercing.
If there are any <color=#fff568>SPIDER-VERSE</color> enemies, attack those enemies for <color=#86e619>210%</color> Piercing instead.

This attack cannot be dodged.

4.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>190%</color> Piercing.
If there are any <color=#fff568>SPIDER-VERSE</color> enemies, attack those enemies for <color=#86e619>240%</color> Piercing instead.

This attack cannot be dodged.

5.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>220%</color> Piercing.
If there are any <color=#fff568>SPIDER-VERSE</color> enemies, attack those enemies for <color=#86e619>270%</color> Piercing instead.

This attack cannot be dodged.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> Piercing to all enemies
Flip <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color>, <color=#fff568>Evade</color>, and <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> on all enemies

6.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>250%</color> Piercing + Flip <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color>, <color=#fff568>Evade</color>, and <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color>.
If there are any <color=#fff568>SPIDER-VERSE</color> enemies, attack those enemies for <color=#86e619>300%</color> Piercing instead.

This attack cannot be dodged.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> Piercing to all enemies
Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> and <color=#fff568>Deflect</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>VILLAIN</color> allies

7.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>300%</color> Piercing + Flip <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color>, <color=#fff568>Evade</color>, and <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color>.
If there are any <color=#fff568>SPIDER-VERSE</color> enemies, attack those enemies for <color=#86e619>400%</color> Piercing instead.

Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> and <color=#fff568>Deflect</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>VILLAIN</color> allies.

This attack cannot be dodged.

1.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>120%</color> Piercing + <color=#86e619>100%</color> Drain.
Repeat this attack <color=#86e619>1</color> additional time.

Characters killed by this attack cannot be revived.
This attack ignores <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> and is Unavoidable.
1.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> Piercing to primary and secondary attacks
Call a <color=#fff568>SINISTER SIX</color> ally with the highest Damage to attack the primary target.

2.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>150%</color> Piercing + <color=#86e619>100%</color> Drain.
Repeat this attack <color=#86e619>1</color> additional time.

Call a <color=#fff568>SINISTER SIX</color> ally with the highest Damage to attack the primary target.

Characters killed by this attack cannot be revived.
This attack ignores <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> and is Unavoidable.
2.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Piercing to primary and secondary attacks

3.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>180%</color> Piercing + <color=#86e619>100%</color> Drain.
Repeat this attack <color=#86e619>1</color> additional time.

Call a <color=#fff568>SINISTER SIX</color> ally with the highest Damage to attack the primary target.

Characters killed by this attack cannot be revived.
This attack ignores <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> and is Unavoidable.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> Piercing to primary and secondary attacks
Flip <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects to negative effects on primary target

4.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>210%</color> Piercing + <color=#86e619>100%</color> Drain + flip <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects to negative effects.
Repeat this attack <color=#86e619>1</color> additional time.

Call a <color=#fff568>SINISTER SIX</color> ally with the highest Damage to attack the primary target.

Characters killed by this attack cannot be revived.
This attack ignores <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> and is Unavoidable.
4.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Piercing to primary and secondary attacks

5.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>240%</color> Piercing + <color=#86e619>100%</color> Drain + flip <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects to negative effects.
Repeat this attack <color=#86e619>1</color> additional time.

Call a <color=#fff568>SINISTER SIX</color> ally with the highest Damage to attack the primary target.

Characters killed by this attack cannot be revived.
This attack ignores <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> and is Unavoidable.
5.nextUpgrade:
Apply <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>SINISTER SIX</color> allies
 +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Piercing to the primary target

6.description:
Apply <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>SINISTER SIX</color> allies.
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>270%</color> Piercing + <color=#86e619>100%</color> Drain + flip <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects to negative effects.
Repeat this attack <color=#86e619>1</color> additional time.

Call a <color=#fff568>SINISTER SIX</color> ally with the highest Damage to attack the primary target.

Characters killed by this attack cannot be revived.
This attack ignores <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> and is Unavoidable.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>80%</color> Piercing to primary and secondary attacks
Call <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>SINISTER SIX</color> allies with the highest Damage to attack the primary target

7.description:
Apply <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>SINISTER SIX</color> allies.
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>350%</color> Piercing + <color=#86e619>100%</color> Drain + flip <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects to negative effects.
Repeat this attack <color=#86e619>1</color> additional time.

Call <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>SINISTER SIX</color> allies with the highest Damage to attack the primary target.

Characters killed by this attack cannot be revived.
This attack ignores <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> and is Unavoidable.

1.description:
On Spawn, apply <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> to self and all <color=#fff568> SINISTER SIX</color> allies.

Gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Armor.
<color=#fff568>SINISTER SIX</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Armor.
1.nextUpgrade:
On Spawn, if there is an enemy <color=#fff568>SPIDER-VERSE</color>, generate <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy for self
Gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Damage

2.description:
On Spawn:
 > Apply <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> to self and all <color=#fff568> SINISTER SIX</color> allies.
 > If there is an enemy <color=#fff568>SPIDER-VERSE</color>, generate <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy for self.

Gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Armor.
Gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Damage.
<color=#fff568>SINISTER SIX</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Armor.
2.nextUpgrade:
<color=#fff568>SINISTER SIX</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Damage
Gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Armor
<color=#fff568>SINISTER SIX</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Armor

3.description:
On Spawn:
 > Apply <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> to self and all <color=#fff568> SINISTER SIX</color> allies.
 > If there is an enemy <color=#fff568>SPIDER-VERSE</color>, generate <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy for self.

Gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Armor.
Gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Damage.
<color=#fff568>SINISTER SIX</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Armor.
<color=#fff568>SINISTER SIX</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Damage.
3.nextUpgrade:
On self or ally Crit, clear all <color=#9055FF>Vulnerable</color> on this character
Gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Damage
<color=#fff568>SINISTER SIX</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Damage

4.description:
On Spawn:
 > Apply <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> to self and all <color=#fff568> SINISTER SIX</color> allies.
 > If there is an enemy <color=#fff568>SPIDER-VERSE</color>, generate <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy for self.

On self or ally Crit, clear all <color=#9055FF>Vulnerable</color> on this character.

Gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Armor.
Gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Damage.
<color=#fff568>SINISTER SIX</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Armor.
<color=#fff568>SINISTER SIX</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Damage.
4.nextUpgrade: In <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color>, when this character or any <color=#fff568>SINISTER SIX</color> ally has <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>100%</color> Accuracy.

5.description:
On Spawn:
 > Apply <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> to self and all <color=#fff568> SINISTER SIX</color> allies.
 > If there is an enemy <color=#fff568>SPIDER-VERSE</color>, generate <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy for self.

On self or ally Crit, clear all <color=#9055FF>Vulnerable</color> on this character.

Gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Armor.
Gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Damage.
<color=#fff568>SINISTER SIX</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Armor.
<color=#fff568>SINISTER SIX</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Damage.

In <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color>, when this character or any <color=#fff568>SINISTER SIX</color> ally has <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>100%</color> Accuracy.
